metadata.title: Friday, 2nd October, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    how many lapidiaries are in Zambia; and
(b)    what the status of the structures at the former Ndola Copper Refinery is.

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health
parts: (a)    when solar power systems will be installed at Lutwi and Numa Health Centres in Kalabo Central Parliamentary Constituency; and
(b)    when construction of additional staff houses at the Health Centres will commence.
(a)    when the renovation of the Zambia Wildlife Camp houses in Lumezi Parliamentary Constituency will commence;
(b)    how many houses are earmarked for renovation;
(c)    what the estimated cost of the project is;
(d)    whether there are any plans to construct new houses; and
(e)    if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    what the source of the problems at the University of Zambia between management and lecturers is; and
(b)    what measures the Government has taken to promote a conducive working environment at the institution.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    why works on township roads in Katete are moving at a slow pace;
(b)    whether the contractor is within the contract period for completing the project; and

(c)    whether the Government is satisfied with the quality of the works undertaken so far. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Thanks - His Excellency the President’s Address - Motion (22nd September) - Resumption of Debate.
